txt.en: Sundered in battles long ago between Angmar and the Zhélruka, Tûr Fúar, the Drearspire looms over Câr Bronach like a twisted, skeletal talon. Within the tower's walls, vile texts and tomes are strewn about, read by the Iron Crown during their horrific rituals. These tomes must be destroyed.
Destroy vile tomes at Tûr Fúar
Destroyed vile tomes at Tûr Fúar ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Sundered in battles long ago between Angmar and the Zhélruka, Tûr Fúar, the Drearspire looms over Câr Bronach like a twisted, skeletal talon.
Tûr Fúar, the Drearspire, can be found in central Câr Bronach.\n\nYou should destroy vile tomes at Tûr Fúar.
